rule.ruleDesc: Sync Solution & Closure Code from Interaction
rule.fullDesc: Sync Solution & Closure Code from Interaction
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var $ = lib.c.$;\u000d\u000a\u000d\u000a// get the interaction record escalated from\u000d\u000avar screlationService = $(\"#screlationService\");\u000d\u000avar screlation = screlationService.getRelatedRecord(\"source.filename=\\\"incidents\\\" and depend=\\\"\" + vars.$L_file[\"id\"] + \"\\\" and type=\\\"Escalation\\\"\");\u000d\u000aif (screlation) {\u000d\u000a var interaction = $(\"incidents\", SCFILE_READONLY).select(\"incident.id=\\\"\" + screlation.source + \"\\\"\").uniqueResult();\u000d\u000a // append interaction Solution to problem\u000d\u000a if (system.functions.denull(vars.$L_file[\"resolution\"]).length() === 0) {\u000d\u000a vars.$L_file[\"resolution\"] = interaction.resolution;\u000d\u000a }\u000d\u000a else {\u000d\u000a var i;\u000d\u000a for (i=0; i<interaction.resolution.length(); i++) {\u000d\u000a vars.$L_file[\"resolution\"].push(interaction.resolution[i]);\u000d\u000a }\u000d\u000a }\u000d\u000a\u000d\u000a // sync Closure Code from interaction\u000d\u000a vars.$L_file[\"closure.code\"] = interaction.resolution_code;\u000d\u000a}"}
